snippet.title: Smash Drums - Official Pop Rock Legends Music Pack Teaser Trailer | Upload VR Showcase
snippet.description: Smash Drums is a VR drum rhythm game developed by PotamWorks SAS. New music packs are on the way to the game including the upcoming Pop Rock Legends music pack and one more unnamed music pack yet to be announced. The Pop Rock Legends music pack for Smash Drums is launching on July 8 for Meta Quest.
